snippet: Officials at the Karolinska Institute said that Paolo Macchiarini will have until November to phase out his research and that his lab would be shut.
abstract: Karolinska Institute in Sweden says it will dismiss regenerative medicine researcher Dr Paolo Macchiarini when his contract expires in November; university cleared surgeon in August 2015 of scientific misconduct accusations related to his trachea transplants but questions about his work continue to arise.
lead_paragraph: Officials at the Karolinska Institute said that Paolo Macchiarini will have until November to phase out his research and that his lab would be shut.

headline.main: Swedish Medical Institute Dismisses Transplant Surgeon
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Sweden: Institute to Cut Ties With Surgeon
